explanation: [0-0] A shirtless and barefoot man with tattoos is bending over in front of a mirror, putting pants on a dog. The dog's front legs are resting on a black stool in front of the mirror. The mirror reflects a wardrobe in the room with many clothes hanging inside and some items placed on it.
